title: Saudi Crown Prince courts investment in London
text:
Saudi Crown Prince courts investment in London Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 02:03 
Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince wants to persuade his British and U.S. allies that ''shock'' reforms have made his country a better place to invest and a more tolerant society on his first foreign tour as heir apparent. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince wants to persuade his British and U.S. allies that "shock" reforms have made his country a better place to invest and a more tolerant society on his first foreign tour as heir apparent.
